"ライサス": "Well done, everyone!"
"Great teamwork all around!"
"Let's hurry back and get that data."
"Just as I thought... There's data regarding Dark Falz in these databases."
"With this... Our chances of defeating Dark Falz should rise considerably."
"Hm? What's this...?"
"Grandpa...?!"
"...I am leaving this message for all of my grandchildren."
"There is something I wish to tell all of you."
"After studying the data left in Lost Central, I discovered something about the Dark Falz that once ran rampant here..."
"I found that it was not yet fully developed. It was unable to make use of its true powers."
"I believe that in the near future, Dark Falz will once again appear, and grow to its full potential."
"I do not know how useful it will be, but I have left the records of the fight between Lost Central and Dark Falz."
"May it guide you all to a solution."
"Taivas, Tulli, Ilma, Kukka, Meri. I won't be around to watch over you forever..."
"And I hope you can forgive me for that."
"I pray that you will all grow into fine adults. When the five of you work together, there is nothing you cannot accomplish."
"Take care of each other."
"Gramps..."
"Thank you, Grandpa."
"You don't have to worry about us. We'll always stick together."
